skillTree.name: Stonehorn
skillTree.description: Like a living boulder, Stonehorns are breathing fossils that are belligerent and mighty when roused to war.

skillTree.name: Gutsy
skillTree.description: This one has guts – quite literally. A surfeit of stomach in fact, you might say, but also the confidence to back up his bulk.

skillTree.name: Lucky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.

skillTree.name: Sword Gnoblars
skillTree.description: A small handful of Gnoblars surround this Ogre Lord, their swords always ready to cut and carve.

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Independent Mind
skillTree.description: Never one to run with the crowd, this one likes to sneak about in front by themselves and surprise the foe – which isn't necessarily an easy thing to do when you're an Ogre!

skillTree.name: Larger Gutplate
skillTree.description: A truly sturdy armour is needed to hold such an overflowing gut in place.

skillTree.name: Sharpened Spears
skillTree.description: Every spear culminates in a devastating point – all the better for skewering helpless meatbags by the dozen.

skillTree.name: All a Quiver
skillTree.description: More arrers means more chances for this big lumbering git to score a direct hit on his dinner.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Quick Throw
skillTree.description: For such corpulent creatures, Ogre Hunters are capable of truly surprising speed.

skillTree.name: Beast Slayer
skillTree.description: "You're a big git, but you're in bad shape. For me, it's a full-time job – now behave yourself."

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Runnin' wiv da Pack
skillTree.description: "How does one combat a pack of angry, charging Sabretusks?" is a question usually asked moments before tragedy.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Sabretusk Pack units

skillTree.name: Their Master's Voice
skillTree.description: When the beast master says jump, his pets only wait to hear how high.

effects.description: Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Sabretusk Pack units

skillTree.name: Silent Hunters
skillTree.description: One might think a pack of vicious predators would be difficult to miss, yet these Sabretusks are adept at silently hunting their prey.

effects.description: Attribute: Stalk for Sabretusk Pack units

skillTree.name: Savage Predators
skillTree.description: As ravening, carnivorous predators, Sabretusks are driven into frenzy by the first scent of blood.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Sabretusk Pack units

skillTree.name: Roaming Free
skillTree.description: Well-trained Sabretusks can roam freely, prowling the land for their next unsuspecting meal.

skillTree.name: Great Beast Hunter
skillTree.description: No beast is too big to be brought to its knees. More meat on its bones is simply more meat for the feast!

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Beastmaster
skillTree.description: To tame the ferocious Sabretusk requires time, skill and a whole lot of raw meat.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20

skillTree.name: Strongarm
skillTree.description: It's hard to shelter from missile fire when projectiles are being launched with enough force to impale a particularly sturdy tree.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stalka
skillTree.description: The best way to eliminate a target is to violently crush their skull before they even notice you're there.

skillTree.name: Stampede Rider
skillTree.description: "Run! RUN! Oh gods, they're coming right at us!"

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Knowledgeable
skillTree.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Farter
skillTree.description: Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.

skillTree.name: Flabby
skillTree.description: The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.

skillTree.name: Big Daddy
skillTree.description: There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.

skillTree.name: Maw Preacher
skillTree.description: "Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."
